locale.message: Import submissions into journals from metapress XML.

Command-line tool for importing metapress XML data into OJS Usage: {$scriptName} [--dry-run] directoryName username The --dry-run option can be used to test without making changes. The directoryName option must point to the directory containing the subdirectories of MetaPress XML. Specify the username you wish to assign the submissions to.
